Package turns

Interface Summary
EndSteppable For Steppable objects that require an end-phase.
Prepareable Interface for Steppable objects that require a prepare phase.
Steppable Steppable objects that have operate during a turn.
 

Class Summary
Turn Turn contains data about each turn (between every step).
Turn.RunnableTurn This handles iterating through the list of sensors in their turn-based order and then allowing them to execute their phases.
TurnController TurnController is class to handle Turn advancements conviently.
TurnController.TurnControllerImplementation This class implements TurnController.
